    Show THL color names

    colornames_thl.Rd

    Shows the predefined names of colors.

    colornames_thl(lang = c("fi", "en"), include.secondary = FALSE)

    Arguments

    lang

    Language of names fetched

    include.secondary

    Should the additional colors be shown? Quantitative and two-way color palettes have additional colors predefined. Names of such might not be informative and they should not be used alone.

    Examples

    colornames_thl("fi")
#>  [1] "thl.vihrea"      "tumma.vihrea"    "tumma.harmaa"    "teksti"         
#>  [5] "keski.harmaa"    "vaalea.harmaa"   "tausta.harmaa"   "oranssi"        
#>  [9] "tumma.oranssi"   "punainen"        "rubiini"         "pinkki"         
#> [13] "roosa"           "tumma.violetti"  "vaalea.vihrea"   "turkoosi"       
#> [17] "tumma.turkoosi"  "syaani.sininen"  "petrooli"        "sininen"        
#> [21] "tumma.sininen"   "hiekka"          "vaalea.turkoosi"
colornames_thl("en")
#>  [1] "thl.green"       "dark.green"      "dark.gray"       "text"           
#>  [5] "middle.gray"     "light.gray"      "background.gray" "orange"         
#>  [9] "dark.orange"     "red"             "ruby"            "pink"           
#> [13] "rosa"            "dark.violet"     "light.green"     "turquoise"      
#> [17] "dark.turquoise"  "cyan.blue"       "petrol"          "blue"           
#> [21] "dark.blue"       "sand"            "light.turquoise"
colornames_thl(include.secondary = TRUE)
#>                     fi                   en
#> 1           thl.vihrea            thl.green
#> 2         tumma.vihrea           dark.green
#> 3         tumma.harmaa            dark.gray
